channel.title: Installation on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Upgrade
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager and search ps_shoppingcart The module page should be displayed and module ps_shoppingcart should appear in the module page

item.title: Uninstall/Install
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manger and search ps_shoppingcart The module page should be displayed and module ps_shoppingcart should appear in the module page

item.title: Uninstall and delete
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manger and search ps_shoppingcart The module page should be displayed and module ps_shoppingcart should appear in the module page
